languages.text: Здесь койки крепко привинчены к полу, а на некоторых красуется тонкая рваная простыня или даже плешивая подушка.
The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.
languages.original_text: Здесь койки крепко привинчены к полу, а на некоторых красуется тонкая рваная простыня или даже плешивая подушка.

traits.locale_text: The beds here are bolted to the floor, and some have thin, torn bedsheets and even tattered pillows.
The beds here are bolted to the floor, and some have thin, torn bedsheets and even tattered pillows.
The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.
The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.
The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.
The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.

languages.text: Estas camas están clavadas al suelo con pernos, y en algunas se ven sábanas finas y rasgadas e incluso almohadas desgarradas.
languages.original_text: The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.

traits.locale_text: Estas camas están clavadas al suelo con pernos, y en algunas se ven sábanas finas y rasgadas e incluso almohadas desgarradas.

languages.text: Die Betten hier sind am Boden festgeschraubt. Einige haben dünne, zerschlissene Bettlaken und sogar zerfetzte Kissen.
languages.original_text: The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.

traits.locale_text: Die Betten hier sind am Boden festgeschraubt. Einige haben dünne, zerschlissene Bettlaken und sogar zerfetzte Kissen.

languages.text: Les lits sont boulonnés au sol. Certains ont des draps fins et déchirés, et même des oreillers en lambeaux.
languages.original_text: The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.

traits.locale_text: Les lits sont boulonnés au sol. Certains ont des draps fins et déchirés, et même des oreillers en lambeaux.

languages.text: 这里的床都被螺栓固定在地板上。有的床上铺着又薄又破的床单，枕头甚至更加破旧。
languages.original_text: The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.

traits.locale_text: 这里的床都被螺栓固定在地板上。有的床上铺着又薄又破的床单，枕头甚至更加破旧。

languages.text: ここのベッドは床にボルトで固定されており、薄い破れたシーツやぼろぼろの枕が付いているものもある。
languages.original_text: The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.

traits.locale_text: ここのベッドは床にボルトで固定されていて、中にはベッドシーツが薄く破れているもの、枕がボロボロになったものまである。
ここのベッドは床にボルトで固定されており、薄い破れたシーツやぼろぼろの枕が付いているものもある。

languages.text: Buradaki yataklar zemine çivilenmiş. Kimilerinde ince ve yırtık çarşaflar, hatta lime lime olmuş yastıklar var.
languages.original_text: The beds here are bolted to the floor, some have thin, torn bed sheets and even tattered pillows.

traits.locale_text: Buradaki yataklar zemine çivilenmiş. Kimilerinde ince ve yırtık çarşaflar, hatta lime lime olmuş yastıklar var.
